name: HPE GreenLake
oneline: I had great experience with HPE when I was working as a partner in integrator company. so I recommended Greenlake service to my new company and everyone loves it in our IT department .Excellent support following, assessment, and consulting team. The as-a-service model provided by HPE Greenlake is perfect for our business and is foundation for our Private Cloud infrastructure. needs to be carefully thought through and designed up front to avoid difficulties in changing technical architecture direction later. HPE is a reliable Vendor for me as a partner. HPE provides Innovations an technologies which our Customers need an understand. it is a new way of offering hpe solutions, delivering the best service user experience and delivering a low consumption proposal. Leveraging the private cloud in an on-demand consumption model.
